}

    font-family: 'gabo_driveregular';

}

}
@font-face {
    font-family: 'metropolismedium';
    src: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0613/1453/1479/files/metropolis-medium-webfont.woff2?v=1654852860') format('woff2'),
         url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0613/1453/1479/files/metropolis-medium-webfont.woff?v=1654852860') format('woff');

}
#shopify-section-16548398534ce502f8{
    background: linear-gradient( to left, #0008ff, #020460);
}
#shopify-section-16548398534ce502f8 .custom-content{
 margin-bottom: 0px;
}
#shopify-section-16548398534ce502f8 .custom__item{
 margin-bottom: 0px;
}
#shopify-section-16548398534ce502f8 .custom__item h2{
    margin: 0;
    line-height: 1;
    padding: 32px 0;
    text-align: center;
    background-image: linear-gradient(130deg, #f2d683 50%, #f1c139 50%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    font-family: 'gabo_driveregular';
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 34px;
    letter-spacing: 4px;
}
#shopify-section-1654840304259a68a7 .background-media-text__text{
    background: transparent;
    padding:0px;
}
#shopify-section-1654840304259a68a7 .background-media-text__text .rte  p{
color: #fff;
    font-family: 'metropolismedium';
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 17px;
    line-height: 1.2;
padding-bottom: 20px;
}
#shopify-section-1654840304259a68a7 .animation-cropper{
    position: absolute;
    left: 25%;
}
#shopify-section-1654840304259a68a7 .btn{
margin: 0;
    background-image: linear-gradient(140deg, #f2d683 50%, #f1c139 50%);
    color: #000;
    font-family: 'texgyreadventorregular';
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 18px;
    letter-spacing: 3px;
padding: 10px 45px;
}

@media (max-width:959px){
#shopify-section-16548398534ce502f8 .custom__item h2{
font-size: 28px;
    padding: 24px 5px;
}
#shopify-section-1654840304259a68a7 .animation-cropper{
    left: 5%;
}
#shopify-section-1654840304259a68a7 .btn{
    padding: 8px 35px;
font-size: 16px;
}
#shopify-section-1654840304259a68a7 .background-media-text__text .rte p{
    font-size: 14px;
    padding-bottom: 14px;
}
}


@media (max-width:768px){
#shopify-section-1654840304259a68a7 .animation-cropper{
left:unset;
position:unset;
padding: 20px 0 0;
}
#shopify-section-1654840304259a68a7 .background-media-text__text .rte p{
color:#000;
}
#shopify-section-1654840304259a68a7 .background-media-text__text{
    text-align: center;
}
}
</style>

settings.title: Sign up and save
settings.text: Subscribe to get special offers, free giveaways, and once-in-a-lifetime deals.

settings.popup_text: Entice customers to sign up for your mailing list with discounts or exclusive offers. Include an image for extra impact.

settings.name: Mike
settings.subject: I love this cleanser
settings.review: this is the dopest fucking cleanser lol

settings.text: A highly coveted speaker, host, and interview subject, Berto shares his inspirational story of success to audiences worldwide. A son of two hard working Haitian immigrants, Berto has created a life that many dream of, through hard work, dedication and the desire to learn and grow every single day.

Andre Berto is a boxing world champion, Haitian Olympian, entrepreneur, and philanthropist. Known worldwide for his knockout style in the boxing ring, Berto now uses the talent, drive and passion that made him millions in the sweet science to to educate others through his growing business and media empire.

During his boxing days, Andre Berto was a media and celebrity darling due to his engaging personality and heartwarming backstory. Now a producer, interviewer and host, Berto shares unique content including in depth celebrity interviews with his vast network of athletes and entertainers, his own cooking show Champs Kitchen and much more.

settings.title: LIFE AFTER SPORT
settings.text: Every elite athlete must have a plan for life after sport. Andre Berto has identified ways to find your passion post retirement and he is driven to share those tools with athletes at every stage of their careers.

settings.title: MY TOUGHEST FIGHT EVER!
settings.text: This was supposed to be a showcase fight for me but David Estrada had other plans. When you get in that ring, you’re going to find out a lot about yourself and that fight showed me a lot about myself.

settings.title: CHAMPS KITCHEN
settings.text: I don’t just have skills in that ring, I can throw down in the kitchen too.  Step in to my kitchen and watch as I prepare one a quick, easy dish - Shrimp Scampi.

settings.title: Item 1
settings.answer: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed congue mi libero, eu mattis augue ultricies vitae. Maecenas vel metus id leo tempor consectetur.

settings.title: Item 2
settings.answer: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed congue mi libero, eu mattis augue ultricies vitae. Maecenas vel metus id leo tempor consectetur.

settings.title: Andre Berto
settings.content: Andre Berto rose to prominence as a boxing star bred from a family of fighters. The first boxer ever to represent Haiti in the Olympic Games, Berto went on to become a two-division welterweight world champion. He fought the best in the world during his time as an active fighter before becoming a champion in the business world. Berto is currently working to motivate and educate others through his catalog of e-courses, books and community outreach.

settings.title: CONNECT WITH ME
settings.content: Stay up to date with all the latest news, videos, products and opportunities here.

settings.title: Speaking Engagements
settings.button_label: Book Andre Berto for your next event

settings.title: Learn Andre Berto's Championship Mindset:
settings.content:
A two-division world champion and 2004 Olympian, Andre Berto has honed the mindset of a champion since childhood. 

Through his inspirational and informative speeches, Andre Berto shares his own unique story of becoming a champion and how he uses the same mindset that made him successful in the ring to win in life. 

He shares tools and insight on how to create your own championship mindset and utilize it in every challenge you tackle in to dominate and win.

settings.title: JOIN MY COMMUNITY
settings.text:
Life is a fight and I want all of you to win! I am creating a community of people looking to attack all of the current battles they are experiencing. This is not simply a place for fighters or athletes, but for everyday people working to be the very best they can and looking for others who share a similar mindset.

Whether your challenges are big or small, my community will offer a place for you to connect with me and others so we can all become
champions in life.  

My community members will be the first to learn about new opportunities, classes, giveaways in more.

settings.subtitle: Presented by Andre Berto
settings.title: Founder & CEO Andre Berto.
settings.text: Andre Berto is a boxing world champion, Haitian Olympian, entrepreneur, and philanthropist. Known worldwide for his knockout style in the boxing ring, Berto now uses the talent, drive and passion that made him millions in the sweet science to to educate others through his growing business and media empire.
